definition: to strike a pose (Chinese opera)/(fig.) to make a public appearance/to come out in public (revealing one's true personality, opinions etc)/(of a product) to appear on the market or at a trade show etc
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Meet 1 & 2 Sofa at the Shanghai InteriorLifestyle exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 壹和贰沙发在上海时尚家居展亮相。

sentences.english: Beyond that, Madonna made her first appearance on American Bandstand.
sentences.chinese: 此外，那年麦当娜首次亮相于美国音乐台。

sentences.english: The BMW i8 concept also appeared at the sneak preview.
sentences.chinese: 宝马i8概念车也亮相预展。

sentences.english: Hillary Clinton's returns from Asia having made a first-class debut.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在亚洲展现了第一流的初次亮相。

sentences.english: In the national day parade square foot teams, women militiamen last appearance.
sentences.chinese: 在国庆阅兵徒步方队中，女民兵方队最后一个亮相。

sentences.english: The robot was first unveiled earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 机器人佳佳在今年早些时候首次亮相。

sentences.english: Six girls in their early teen appeared.
sentences.chinese: 六名十三四岁的姑娘在舞台上亮相。

sentences.english: T -sok will be an unprecedented scale for the quality and appearance show.
sentences.chinese: 硕为将以前所未有的规模及品质亮相展会。

sentences.english: Thomas will be given a chance to impress during tomorrow night's first friendly against Al-Hilal.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯将会在明晚对阿尔希拉尔的友谊赛中出场亮相。

sentences.english: Bryant is expected to play tonight against Oklahoma City at Staples Center.
sentences.chinese: 科比期望在今晚对阵雷霆的比赛中亮相斯坦普斯。

sentences.english: A 2 time ranking event semi-finalist, making his third appearance here at the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 两次排名赛的半决赛，第三次在克鲁斯堡亮相。

sentences.english: The two-handed piano-playing robot was given its worldwide debut at TIROS.
sentences.chinese: 这个用两只手弹钢琴的机器人首次在国际上亮相。

sentences.english: Olympic refueling for the Chinese jade acclaimed debut Need for the glass to wear.
sentences.chinese: 为奥运加油，为中国玉喝彩，极品玻璃地龙凤佩亮相。

sentences.english: The strategic missile troop presented itself for the first time on the parade.
sentences.chinese: 其中，战略导弹部队是首次亮相。

sentences.english: This luxury car were unveiled at the Geneva Motor Show in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 这辆豪华车亮相于2010年日内瓦车展。

sentences.english: The bear was shown off at the International Robot Show in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这款机器熊已经在日本国际机器人展上亮相。

definition: to show oneself/to appear/(of a deity) to appear in the flesh
to go on stage/fig. to appear on the scene/used in advertising to mean new product
to show one's face/to appear (in public)
to appear on camera/to play a role in a film
